Robert Madoel

  1. Alternate Birth Name: McDowell
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: L. M. Blythe
  4. Location of Family: Holmesville, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Wymore, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 10
  8. Date of Birth: Unknown
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: Later lived in Chester and Beatrice.
  11. Source: OTR 92, 291; Eloise Thomsen Corres.; Multiple name letters in paper headed Mrs. Clyde E. Blevins.
